BannerParam1: We have a home collection and delivery service and we take care of all the grooming and bathing needs that your dog may need.
BannerParam3: Our prices may vary depending on the size and breed of your dog and your specific needs.
BannerParam4: Although we can assure you that we are the best option for canine aesthetics in Tulum.
HomeServiceCard1: We pick up your furry and return it to the door of your house.
HomeServiceCard2: Premium grooming for your puppy or adult dog.
HomeServiceCard3: Low cost, no contracts, no hidden fees.
HandStrippingDescription: It is an artificial change of hair. We remove the layers that are about to fall out so that it does not hinder the growth of new layers of hair and thus grow much stronger..
